label: logicB:education_en
steps: [1] If a student completes the prerequisite course, then they meet the program requirement.
[2] If a student meets the program requirement, then they gain access to the advanced seminar.
[3] For every student x, if x submits a research proposal that meets the guidelines, then x’s proposal is approved.
[4] If Student A has access to the advanced seminar and Student A’s proposal is approved, then Student A can register for the capstone project.
[5] Student A completed the prerequisite course.
[6] Student A submitted a research proposal that meets the guidelines.
[7] Student A has access to the advanced seminar and Student A’s proposal is approved.
[8] Student A can register for the capstone project.
